segments.text: You've decided that you definitely want to purchase this particular one ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: To be honest , I haven't really done much research .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I would recommend that you at least glance through these brochures , just to make sure that you have selected the right policy for you . Take your time , Sir .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks for your advice , after going through all of these materials I've decided not to go with my initial choice .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course , Sir . If I could have your details again and your ID , I'll check them and we can go on .
segments.speaker: S1
